text:
="preserve">Moshe Sharoni (, 1929 – 20 September 2020) was a Romanian-born Israeli politician. He was a member of the Knesset for Gil between 2006 and 2009. He was head of the breakaway faction, Justice for the Elderly. Sharoni was born in Buhuși, Romania.
Sharoni died on 20 September 2020 at the age of 91.
